subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Coach Bill Parcells said Terrell Owens had done everything he had been asked to do in practice this week. Still, Parcells said he had not decided if Owens would play on Sunday.
snippet: Coach Bill Parcells said Terrell Owens had done everything he had been asked to do in practice this week. Still, Parcells said he had not decided if Owens would play on Sunday.
